values:
"HOW COULD THIS HAPPEN TO ME?"

So, I'm ODing on DPs and laxatives.  And I have to make the fast a day longer, until monday, 'cause I fucked up. 

AH!

Fuck.

But I walked all over.  And wyled.

BUT. 

I ate.

SO, tomorrow, NO FOOD + 400-500 calories of DDR. 

I'm waking up early. 

FUCK FAILING.  I'M NOT, OK OK OK OK OK OK.

Over exercise.  

AH!

And then, I'm done, I don't care.

I get really weak and get all "blacked out" sometimes, though.  I hope that I can do this.

I'm probably going to take some caffeine pills or drink it in some way, but not tomorrow.  Not until tuesday, probably.  

I MUST DO THIS.

It can't be too hard.  

Just the weakness thing.  UGH.

Wish me luck.

3 days barely eating anything.

<3traveling.
<3philly.
<3wylin'aroundphillywithahugebookbagonmyback.

Wish me luck!

Made me pretty skinny.

But still fat!  :D

Lol. 

STOP DRINKING DIET COKE.  If you drink more than 5 cans a day, STOP.

You'll see results. 

TRUST ME.

OHEMGEE.

D'oh.  Yesterday, I ate more than I wanted to.  So, I took 4 laxatives, which is ODing for me.  I shat like I've never shat before -- in a gas station.  I've realized lots of Diet Coke and walking + laxatives = BIG SHIT FAST.  I felt better.

My "dieting buddy" and I walked for like 4.5 hours, woo, and I played DDR earlier, so I feel good.

Going to White Castle tonight on a whim, which is a far drive, and I'll just eat like half a burger (1/2 the bun, yuck) and some onion rings.  DIET COKE!  I'm excited, though.

Friday + saturday = "fast days," then conservation school BOOTCAMP, little food, lots of activity.  July is awesome.  August is going to be great, too.  I just want to be high all the time or something, I swear, and not eat.  I JUST WANT TO BE FREE OF THIS SHITTY LIFE and FORGET ABOUT EVERYTHING.  Sleep, forget it.  Food, forget it.  You get what I'm sayin?

So, here's the plan:

Tomorrow-Saturday: Eat little, whatevs whatevs.  Pack for conservation school.  Yeah.
Sunday-sunday: Conservation school, crazy outdoor activities, like hiking, canoeing, et cetera.  CRAZY.  Don't eat much.  :D

23,24: Wyle with friends, if i eat, eat salads.  Maybe i'll get chinese.  I'm going to be a savage after conservation school, like a crazy hermit who is reintroduced to the real world.  

25-27: College orienation.  Not many chances to eat.

The rest is historyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyy.  :D

Ugh, I want to get to 110.  :/ :/ :/ :/ :/ :/ :/

Yay for not eating, yesterday!  What a nice start to vacation!

I really hope Val's family is not a "let's go out and eat for every meal" type family.

'Cause, yeah.

Salads, salads, salads.  I won't even eat all the chicken.

And I brought my favorite 0 calorie drink mix to chug.

So, I might come back the 10th or 11th.  Eek.  Well, that's five or six days.

I wonder.  If I can actually succeed, I will weigh myself.  Finally.  But I never do, and then I never weigh myself.  Sigh.

*excited*

I'm going on vacation with my really thin friend (who barely eats) from the 6th-12th.

It's weird, I don't even envy her -- she doesn't really use her skinniness to her advantage.  She just looks . . . weird? 

So, I'll probably "fast" the whole time.  (Meaning a salad at dinner, nothing else.  Lots of diet coke!)

And she likes walking, so lots of that!  <3

I'm fasting today, too.  400 calories of DDR, walk for an hour and twenty minutes, have boyfriend fun, go see a play, exercise more/wyle?  

(Girls who I'm fasting with until the 12th -- I have internet access, so I'll keep updating!)

Ugh, I ate more than usual, but not enough to gain.  No way.  It feels weird, though, eating . . . 

Tomorrow should be cool.  I really want a salad.  I love salads, so much.

And I need to wyle around.  

It should be neato.

HOLY SHIT.

I just tried on some old clothes, bottoms, basically, with just a tank top, and DAMN, I look good.  Problem:  Certain kinds of shorts still look like shit -- like soffes or whatever they're called.  My legs are shaped like upside down pears, that's why.  I'm actually trying to get rid of all this muscle and enlongate them, so I'm trying to stretch more.  

But in a skirt and tank top -- DAMN.  I'd tap that. 

Maybe 1-2 more weeks of starvation.  :P

Is amazing.  But anyway.

Yesterday was OK, I ate here and there, and worked and wyled.

Today'll be better, 'cause my friend is coming over at 10(ish) and we'll probably play some DDR and wyle more.

And at 12:45ish, I'll go walking with her, which is good, and then I'm going hiking!

I just have to watch the food for later, I can't really eat much 'cause I had some leftover steak (protein!) and the top of a small slice of cheesecake (chocolate!).   Shouldn't amount to anything, considering how much exercise that I do.  

And I'm about to do 200-300 calories of DDR before she gets here, so wish me luck!

SO, I made this HUGE pot of cabbage soup, God knows how it's not going to go bad in a week, (freeze it), and I'm going to try to do this.  The diet calls for eating other things each day, too, like fruit, today, vegetables, tomorrow, et cetera.  It gets more easy as the week goes on -- and it's actually more than I usually eat.  And I figure, yeah, if I go out to eat with my friends, we can't just eat FRUIT.  So, yeah, I guess I'll eat a little soup, and other shit -- if needed -- but not more in calories than the fruit would be!  

I'm pretty excited about the rave that I'm going to on friday and the Portuguese (lol) "party" on saturday.  Dancing, dancing, dancing!  Love it!

I hate how eating a few spoonfuls of ice cream makes me sick.  Completely sick!  And I keep thinking that I shouldn't be eating anything, all day, because I'm not going to get the chance to exercise/walk (I'm with Matty).

I want to get to 105-115 by the end of summer.  Yeah, I can do it!
